item.title: t 2 video blog
item.description: This will be about Text 2 Video generation Link to heading

This will be about ML Model deployment Link to heading So we have built the ML/DL model in notebook and we want to deploy it to serve the customers there are two main sources of deployment Edge Deployment Cloud Deployment Edge Deployment Link to heading We want to deploy the models on device due to one of the following main reasons Latency requiremnt Network latency is prohibitievly low sometime for real time deployment and control No Network availablity Models are deployed where there is not internet available Few examples Deploying perception model for advance driving assistant systems or Self driving cars ML models deploymet on machine in distant fields with no internet conectivity and on spot results demand.
